content: this is one of my series of my cow patterns the cow is made in white with color corresponding spots to the theme in this case pink the pattern also comes with a pattern for overalls and a mini fruit raspberry to go with the cow skill level intermediate this pattern requires basic knowledge of common stitches and/or amigurumi as this pattern has quite a few pieces and some sewing please do not sell distribute or duplicate this pattern in any shape or form you may sell the finished makes but please credit my shop @sunny stitches as the pattern designer if you have any questions or comments feel free to reach out to me this is my first pattern happy crocheting materials -pink yarn -white yarn -green yarn -black yarn small amount for nose -5mm crochet hook -stitch marker -needle for sewing -14mm safety eyes - optional buttons for overalls -scissors -polyfill or other toy stuffing
